ausf.software.util

Class ByteBufferReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ausf.software.util.ByteBufferReader

  • public class ByteBufferReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of a file reader of a fixed size of the readable buffer.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Version:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Shcherbina Daniil
    See Also:
    WAVFile
